channel.title: Destructive-X | NEW | VPS HOSTED
channel.description:
[center][b]I see plenty of servers these days and they're always the same... So recently i thought, why not come up with my own server and make it unique... Different from other servers. and that is exactly what i did. on March 25th 2013... My birthday, I decided to pursue my goal. We've went from 1 player on avg to 80 and back to 1. We've hit a lot of rough patches and to be honest my only goal... Is to have a highschool job that i enjoy... But recently i haven't been reaching alot of players... only from 1-10 players on avg... And this is because advertising is very hard nowadays... Without money, it's almost impossible to advertise your server.[COLOR="#FF0000"]But its not like that if you can recieve help from players and your fellow community.[/b][/center] [b] What I'm trying to say is that... If you join my server you will be proud. you will be astonished of the fact how friendly my community is and how much we actually care about the community. [/b]
[SIZE=6]Why join Destructive-X?[/SIZE]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OSM66P0.png[/img]
[b]VPS Hosted Great Community Active Forums Custom Slayer System. Customs, but not a lot so that your head would spin wild. Amazing PVM and tons of bosses. Custom PVM bosses. Great PKing. No OP weapons. Many areas to explore. Dungeoneering. Custom Pest Control Barrows [100%] (Including Guthans and Dharoks.) Stable ECONOMY Jad All SpellBooks Tok-Har-Kal[/b]
[b]And SOOOO much more, you just have to come check us out for yourself! :)[/b]
[b][size=10pt][b]Not to mention If a player wants a certain update, all he has to do is make a post on the forums, and I will personally add it, if I believe it will benefit the server and others would like it aswell.[/b][/size][/b]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3TOSA45.png[/img] [SPOILER=Media][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/V27wFlb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/w9n4EHJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/axCf2Va.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9Z50YkN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o70E5qJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7pqCIRo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CN857M0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YjTa99j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QXisENz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/joBmqIn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tc1jqQV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/V3SMJ9s.png[/img][/SPOILER][/CENTER]
[b] Staff team of Destructive-X: [size=10pt][b]Owner & founder:[/b][/size] -Hamza Adminstrators: -Foxx -ArcaneWolf87 -Open Moderators: -Super Nova -Fork -Yetties -Open spot[/b]

item.title: Destructive-X | NEW | VPS HOSTED
item.dc:creator: @imacoolguyful imacoolguyful
item.description:
@imacoolguyful wrote:

[center]I see plenty of servers these days and they’re always the same…
So recently i thought, why not come up with my own server and make it unique… Different from other servers.
and that is exactly what i did. on March 25th 2013… My birthday, I decided to pursue my goal.
We’ve went from 1 player on avg to 80 and back to 1. We’ve hit a lot of rough patches and to be honest my only goal… Is to have a highschool job that i enjoy… But recently i haven’t been reaching alot of players… only from 1-10 players on avg… And this is because advertising is very hard nowadays… Without money, it’s almost impossible to advertise your server.[COLOR="#FF0000"]But its not like that if you can recieve help from players and your fellow community.[/center]

What I’m trying to say is that… If you join my server you will be proud. you will be astonished of the fact how friendly my community is and how much we actually care about the community.

[SIZE=6]Why join Destructive-X?[/SIZE]

[CENTER]

VPS Hosted
Great Community
Active Forums
Custom Slayer System.
Customs, but not a lot so that your head would spin wild.
Amazing PVM and tons of bosses.
Custom PVM bosses.
Great PKing.
No OP weapons.
Many areas to explore.
Dungeoneering.
Custom Pest Control
Barrows [100%] (Including Guthans and Dharoks.)
Stable ECONOMY
Jad
All SpellBooks
Tok-Har-Kal

And SOOOO much more, you just have to come check us out for yourself!

[size=10pt]Not to mention If a player wants a certain update, all he has to do is make a post on the forums, and I will personally add it, if I believe it will benefit the server and others would like it aswell.[/size]

[CENTER]

[/SPOILER][/CENTER]
